Package com.compendium.ui.toolbars.system

Interface Summary
IUIToolBarManager This interface contains the required methods to be supported by any class wishing to be a UIToolBarManager
 

Class Summary
DraggableToolBarIcon This class create a toolbar icon which can be dragged and copied and which has a String identifier for the drop.
UIToolBar This class extends JToolbar to hold some extra information for Compendium's toolbar system and to override some basic behaviours like drag/drop floatability.
UIToolBarController This class controls a collection of toolbar panels which can be added and removed from it.
UIToolBarControllerRow This class controls a collection of toolbar panels which can be added and removed from it.
UIToolBarFloater UIToolBarFloater defines a dialog to display a floating toolbar in.
UIToolBarImages This class has method for retrieving toolbar image files.
UIToolBarPanel This class manages the toolbars placed in it.
